name: school_profile_2008_2016_
title: School Profile (point) 2008-2016
abstract:
This dataset contains point level school profile data for all of Australia from 2008-2016.
ACARA collects, analyses and reports statistical and related information about schools and the outcomes of schooling, as required by the COAG Education Council under ACARA's Charter.
ACARA's work in this area is undertaken under the Council?s Principles and Protocols for Reporting on Schooling in Australia (2009), which are intended to guide and inform the use and publication of data generated in the process of measuring the performance of schooling in Australia.
Further information on the Index of Community Socio-Educational Advantage (ICSEA) can be found at http://docs.acara.edu.au/resources/About_icsea_2014.pdf.
Further caveats and explanations of other provided data items can also be found on the My School website at https://www.myschool.edu.au.

selectedAttributes.name: calendar_year
selectedAttributes.title: Calendar Year
selectedAttributes.description: The year to which the data relates.

selectedAttributes.name: language_background_other_than_english
selectedAttributes.title: Language Background Other Than English
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of students within a school's population who speak a language other than English at home. If data provider has not provided LBOTE data in the school census, then LBOTE is derived by ACARA from NAPLAN student level data.

selectedAttributes.name: suburb
selectedAttributes.title: Suburb
selectedAttributes.description: The suburb in which the school is located.
